message from him today.
I was about to post it when I read your post.
 
Bru=
ce
Bruce Halliday

Bruce, Frank R., since I feel like =
this all got started somehowbecause of me, let me just say that I think a l=
ot of what we werecollectively arguing about may be semantics. We're all ag=
reed aboutpursuing this research in a positive frame of mind. If you have a=
naturally positive one, or if you need to do something ritualistic toremind=
 yourself that you are in a positive mindset, it really doesn'tmatter. The =
same end is obtained.We're all okay, no matter which waywe get to the posit=
ive vibe. As John Lennon said, "Whatever gets youthrough the night, its alr=
ight."You're both splendid researchers and you are both right, HMO.Ann--- I=
n EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@...> wrote:>> Bruce,> =
> No problem, you are entitled to your perspective and opinion. Ireally don=
't see anywhere in my post, a stance being made beside myagreeing with Sump=
tion. Since you mentioned it, I have a problem withpeople who consider them=
selves to be advanced researchers in ITCtelling others that there are thing=
s you need protection from in thisfield. I have seen this fear mongering ov=
er the many years I have beeninvolved with my research and the research of =
colleagues andassociates and it has never helped anyone. Are there negative=
 entitiesout there that want to influence you and distract you? Sure there =
are!Probably just as many who want to help you and they have been theresinc=
e the beginning of each of our lives.> > The rule of thumb in dealing with =
those negative forces is to notfollow their messages. If the message is bas=
ically negative then giveit no merit and carry on. No ritual needed! Now if=
 you wantcredentials I can give you my "paranormal resume" and let the piss=
ingcontest begin. All you need to know about me is I know enough to knowtha=
t the more I learn and experience the more I realize I have a lotto learn. =
Ego you say, not at all. > > Best regards,> > Frank R.> > ----- Original Me=
ssage ----> From: bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...>> To: EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com> Sent: Monday, January 14, 2008 8:29:15 AM> Subject: [EVP-ITC] F=
or Frank R. this is long but I think worth the read> > > > > > > > > > > > =

and I will not > > get into a pissing match over it, but I did feel I neede=
d to address > > it.> > > > I promised myself that I would not post a respo=
nse to any one > > person,only to a subject in general, but I will have to =
break that > > promise on this one.> > > > I think your response to the rit=
ual protection post was egotistical, > > careless and uninformed. That was =
the response I would expect from a > > close minded sceptic that had no rea=
l experience in this field.> > > > As a researcher in the paranormal in gen=
eral you should know that > > there is a very real and present danger from =
darker entities, > > especially in the field of box research that is still =
in its infancy > > and our knowledge is not advanced enough using this meth=
od to be so > > hap hazard about it.> > > > All are entitled to their own o=
pinion as far as the way they go about > > their own research but to advise=
 that protection from the negative > > means nothing and to do it in an ope=
n forum where there are > > impressionable new individuals that are just en=
tering into this > > research is very careless on your part.> > > > Some re=
searchers here including Steve and myself among other have > > recorded fil=
es with messages that tell us that the communication > > process is being h=
indered at that time by what we refer to as > > "dark heads" and our spirit=
 contacts actually use that term. they > > have also told us when asked why=
 communication was so bad that it was > > being blocked by negative entitie=
s. > > > > I only one of a few that have gotten this exact communication. S=
o > > there is a real threat from negative energy or entities.> > > > Plus =
through research we have found that it is possible for entities > > to trav=
el back and forth between our realms during an open box > > session. If you=
 listened to numerous files Steve and I have posted > > asking our friends =
mike and Lisa on the other side to insure that all > > and any spirits that=
 may have traveled through please go back and > > have gotten conformation =
from them every time.> > > > If it is possible for an entity to travel thro=
ugh the portal that a > > box MAY produce then it stands to reason it is po=
ssible that it can > > be a dark entity.> > > > As far as fear goes, I agre=
e wholeheartedly, fear definitely feeds > > the negative. And that is my po=
int. The protection ritual does not > > create a relative tangible barrier,=
 it is simply a metaphoric symbol > > of putting your mind in the right pla=
ce so as not to feed this > > negative energy.> > > > And the protection we=
 receive from our tech/guides on the other side > > in my belief is very re=
al, I believe they do actually run > > interference for us as far as negati=
vity goes and the part of the > > ritual where we invoke their help is just=
 a form of respect and > > acknowledgement that they are constantly watchin=
g out for us.> > > > this being said, Of course everyone will adhere to the=
ir own beliefs > > as far as this subject is concerned. I just felt that yo=
ur response > > was a little strong and came more from the attitude that I =
also > > suffer from that is to say " negative spirit yeah bring it on"> > =
